duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform bank reconciliations for a dozen bank accounts monthly.
Send automated invoices to customers monthly.
Monitor AR balance and follow-up with restaurant operators on overdue accounts.
Identify unresolved debts, develop repayment plans, and report on the overall collections process monthly.
Engage with restaurant operators regarding credit card processing inquiries.
Assist with changes and updates to restaurant operator's bank account information.
Perform additional tasks related to the restaurant operator's business such as updating legal business information and performing EIN checks.
Coordinate with internal teams to escalate issues related to credit card processing.
Uphold tax levies and liens on restaurant operators when requested.
